comment: Example endpoint metadata written by DeployHandler
description: This file is written to s3://fraud-detection-config/current-endpoint.json by DeployHandler and read by ScoreHandler

notes.endpointName: Fixed name for the production endpoint (fraud-detection-prod). ScoreHandler reads this to know which endpoint to invoke.
notes.modelName: Unique model name including timestamp. Each training run creates a new model.
notes.deploymentTimestamp: Unix timestamp (milliseconds) when the model was deployed
notes.usage: ScoreHandler reads this file at the start of each inference pipeline execution to get the current endpoint name
notes.updates: This file is updated by DeployHandler each time a new model is deployed (weekly training pipeline)
